info.description: Job platform backend API with authentication, job management, applications, companies, and push notifications
info.title: Keerja Backend API

patch.description: Approve a pending job posting (admin only)
Reject a pending job posting (admin only)

get.description: Get paginated list of companies with search, filter, and sort

parameters.description: Search by company name, email, legal name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get full company details including verification, documents, and stats

put.description: Admin can edit company information to fix errors or typos

delete.description: Delete company with validation. Cannot delete if has active jobs unless force flag is used.

parameters.description: Force delete even with active jobs
parameters.name: force

patch.description: Approve, reject, suspend, or blacklist a company

post.description: Create a new job title with category recommendation
post.summary: Create a new job title (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a single job title by ID
get.summary: Get a job title by ID (admin only)

get.description: Get all device tokens registered for the authenticated user

post.description: Register a device token for push notifications

get.description: Get statistics of user's device tokens by platform

post.description: Validate if a device token is still valid with FCM

get.description: Get a specific device token by its ID

403.description: Forbidden - Token does not belong to user

delete.description: Remove a device token from the system

403.description: Forbidden - Token does not belong to user

get.description: Returns jobs grouped by status (active, inactive, draft, in_review)
get.summary: Get jobs grouped by status for mobile tab UI

get.description: Get gender preferences, age ranges, skills, education levels, and experience levels for job requirements
get.summary: Get job requirements options for mobile

get.description: Get job types, work policies, company addresses, and salary ranges for job posting
get.summary: Get job types options for mobile

get.description: Get job types, work policies, education levels, experience levels, and gender preferences
get.summary: Get all job posting options (DEPRECATED - use /job-types instead)

get.description: Returns job categories, subcategories, job types, work policies, education levels, experience levels, gender preferences, salary and age defaults
get.summary: Get job posting form fields/options for mobile

get.description: Search job titles with fuzzy matching and category recommendations
get.summary: Get job titles with smart search

get.description: Get job types, work policies, company addresses, and salary ranges for job posting
get.summary: Get job types and work policies for mobile

get.description: Retrieve all company size categories with optional filtering by active status
Retrieve a single company size category by its ID
Retrieve all industries with optional filtering by active status and search query
Retrieve a single industry by its ID
Retrieve cities with optional filtering by province, active status, and search query
Retrieve a single city by its ID with province information
Retrieve districts with optional filtering by city, active status, and search query
Retrieve a single district by its ID with full location hierarchy (city and province)
Retrieve all provinces with optional filtering by active status and search query
Retrieve a single province by its ID

post.description: Send a push notification to multiple users (batch send)
post.summary: Send push notification to multiple users

post.description: Send a push notification to a specific device token

400.description: Invalid request or failed to send

post.description: Send a push notification to all subscribers of a topic

200.description: Push notification sent to topic successfully

400.description: Invalid request or failed to send

post.description: Send a push notification to all devices of a specific user
Send a test push notification to verify FCM integration

400.description: Invalid request or failed to send

post.description: Authenticate admin user and get access token
Logout admin and invalidate session

get.description: Get authenticated admin user profile

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get list of all active device sessions

post.description: Revoke refresh token for a specific device
Request password reset token
Send OTP code to email for password reset
Authenticate user and get access token
Login and get refresh token for persistent sessions
Logout user and invalidate token
Revoke all refresh tokens (logout from all devices)

get.description: Get list of OAuth providers connected to user account
Get Google OAuth authorization URL
Process Google OAuth callback and authenticate user

delete.description: Disconnect an OAuth provider from user account

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token
Get new access token using current token
Register a new user account
Register new user and send OTP code for email verification
Resend OTP verification code to email
Resend email verification link
Reset user password with token
Reset password using OTP verification
Verify user's email address with token
Verify user's email address using OTP code

get.description: List companies with filters and pagination (Glints-like)

post.description: Create a new company profile with basic details and optional logo
Accept invitation to join a company as employer user

get.description: Get list of addresses for the authenticated employer's company

post.description: Create a new address record for the authenticated user's company. Address records are persisted and soft-deletable so users can reuse previously created addresses.

delete.description: Soft-delete an address record belonging to the authenticated user's company

get.description: Get verification status of the authenticated user's company (automatic, no ID needed)
Get all companies where the authenticated user is a member with full company details
Retrieve a specific company profile by ID

put.description: Update company profile with banner, logo, and editable information. Company name, location (country/province/city), employee count, and industry are read-only (set during company creation). Full address is fetched from company creation but can be edited here.

parameters.description: Full address (dari data company saat create, bisa di-edit)
parameters.name: full_address

parameters.description: Deskripsi Singkat - Visi dan Misi Perusahaan (max 1000 chars)
parameters.name: short_description

delete.description: Delete a company profile by ID (Only owner can delete)

post.description: Upload a banner image for the company

get.description: Get all pending invitations for a company

post.description: Resend invitation email to employee
Send invitation email to employee to join the company
Upload a logo image for the company
Submit a verification request for the company with NPWP and optional NIB

parameters.description: Upload NPWP Perusahaan (pdf, jpg, jpeg, png, max 10MB)
parameters.name: npwp_file

get.summary: Get company statistics (jobs, applications, followers, reviews, etc.)

get.description: Get company verification status (verified or pending)

post.description: Save job draft with validation (salary, age ranges, XSS sanitization). Support create new or update existing by draft_id

patch.description: Mark a job as inactive. Requires employer ownership.

post.description: Change job status from draft to pending_review. Requires company to be verified.

409.description: Job already published or in wrong status

get.description: Get authenticated user's profile. Use query param 'include' to fetch related data: 'all' for everything, or comma-separated list like 'educations,skills,projects'

parameters.description: Include related data: all, educations, experiences, skills, certifications, languages, projects, documents, preference
parameters.name: include

get.description: Get list of user's certifications
Get list of user's documents (CV, portfolio, etc)

post.description: Upload document to user profile (resume, certificate, etc.)
Add education to user profile

get.description: Get list of user's educations

post.description: Add work experience to user profile

get.description: Get list of user's work experiences
Get list of user's languages
Get list of user's projects/portfolio
Get list of user's skills

post.description: Add multiple skills to user profile in batch
Upload a profile photo for the authenticated user

force.description: Force delete even with active jobs

industry_name.description: Master Data Relations (Name-based - for mobile UI dropdown)

province_id.description: Master Data Relations (ID-based - alternative to names)

company_id.description: Company ID for the job draft

deskripsi.description: Job description (will be sanitized for XSS)

job_type_id.description: Master data: job type ID (full-time, part-time, etc.)

work_policy_id.description: Master data: work policy ID (onsite, remote, hybrid)

body.example: You have a new job match
You have a new job match
You have a new job match
You have a new job match

status.description: pending, under_review, verified, rejected, blacklisted, expired

full_location.description: e.g., "Batujajar, Kabupaten Bandung Barat, Jawa Barat"

is_current.description: whether this is the current device

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
